title: HUGE 3 Bedroom Apartment in Southport Corridor/Lakeview Aug 15/Sept 1!
posting_body: Available AUGUST 15th or SEPTEMBER 1st - VERY LARGE (over 2,000 SF) AND BRIGHT 3 Bed/1 Bath Apartment in a small quiet building steps to the Southport Corridor restaurants, shops and is ideally located 2 blocks to Blaine school.
You won’t believe the size of this place!!
- There is a separate living room, dining room, large kitchen, plus TWO sun rooms - one in the front and one in the rear.
A beautiful built-in fireplace sits in one of the living areas.
There are 3 bedrooms large enough for a King-sized bed with closets.
Additionally - you have a front hall closet, linen closet, and broom closet.
HEAT IS INCLUDED in the rent, saving you about $150/month!
You will stay cool in the August heat because the unit has A/C AND CEILING FANS (owner installs window units).
The apartment features hardwood floors throughout.
Additionally - there is a wonderfully decorated outdoor patio where you can put your furniture and grill or just hang out, available for tenants to enjoy Chicago's beautiful sunny days.
- 1506 W Addison Street #3
- AVAILABLE AUGUST 15th or SEPTEMBER 1st
- $300 Move-In Fee Per Person
- Application fee of $40 Per Person
- No security deposit!
- Close to everything you need - Southport Corridor is filled with shops and restaurants
- Shared Laundry
- Tenant responsible for Electric
- Cats ok with one-time cat fee of $250 per cat (max 2) Sorry, no dogs
LEASE TERMS
Owner pays for heat, cooking gas, trash, water and sewer.
Tenant is responsible for electric.
Good credit and verifiable income a must.
Minimum credit score of 650 required.
One or more owners are licensed IL.
real estate brokers with Essex Realty Group, Inc.
